H0.text: Afternoon clouds forming and blocking sunlight is an example of a change in climate.

H1.text: A series of tornadoes occurring over a one‑week period is an example of a change in climate.

H2.text: An overnight temperature drop that causes frost to form is an example of a change in climate.

H3.text: The average amount of annual precipitation decreases is an example of a change in climate.

A4.text: Monsoonal precipitation over the Northern Hemisphere has increased since 1980.

A5.text: Precipitation has generally increased over land north of 30°N from 1900 to 2005 but has declined over the tropics since the 1970s.

A6.text: The Sahel, the Mediterranean, southern Africa and parts of southern Asia have become drier.
